key.name: change_password_per_day_description
key.value: You can force users to change their password at every specific day. Also you can choose how to deal with users that their password expired. When password of user expired, plugin notify user automatically to change password.

key.name: deal_with_expired_password_normal_with_notif
key.value: Users can do anything with notifying about their password expiration

key.name: deal_with_expired_password_force_with_notif
key.value: Users can not do anything until change password

key.name: description_change_password
key.value: In order to improve your security, change your password. Log in using the old password and use Profile Edit page to change your account password.

key.name: reset_password_form_text
key.value: In order to improve security, please change your password.

key.name: set_all_password_invalid_description
key.value: You can set all passwords invalid and users will forced to change their password via a link sent to their E-Mail.

key.name: set_all_password_expired_description
key.value: You can set all passwords expired and users will be treated as if their password change interval has been elapsed.

key.name: set_all_password_valid_description
key.value: You can set all passwords valid and users will not forced to change their password.

key.name: invalidate_user_password_warning
key.value: Are you sure to invalidate password of this user?

key.name: validate_user_password_warning
key.value: Are you sure to validate password of this user?

key.name: email_for_changing_password_description
key.value:
Dear user ($username),

You should change your password for security issue. You can change your password with bellow link:

key.name: password_is_invalid_description
key.value: Your previous password is invalid for a security issue. You should enter from link that sent to your email.

key.name: resend_email_change_password_label
key.value: Resend email for changing your password

key.name: token_is_expired_description
key.value: Your token for changing your password has been invalid. You should click on resend link.

key.name: password_is_empty
key.value: Password field can not be empty.

key.name: repeated_password_is_empty
key.value: Repeated password field can not be empty.

key.name: password_is_equal_with_old_password
key.value: New password can not be equal with previous password.

key.name: password_is_not_equal_with_repeated_password
key.value: Password should equal with repeated password.

key.name: find_users_placeholder
key.value: Enter part of username or email
